Orchid Network Upgrade

RSKIP 99
Title Orchid Network Upgrade
Created 31-AUG-18
Author AE
Purpose Sca,Usa,Sec
Layer Core
Complexity 3
Status Draft

Abstract

This RSKIP references all RSKIPs that are part of Orchid network upgrade.

Specification

  • Network upgrade codename: Orchid
  • Mainnet activation block number: 729,000
  • Testnet activation block number: 802,000
  • RSKIPs included:
    • RSKIP 85 - Performance and scalability improvements in Remasc native contract
    • RSKIP 87 2-way-peg unlimited whitelisting support
    • RSKIP 88 Bridge methods local calls restrictions
    • RSKIP 89 Bridge block locator performance improvements
    • RSKIP 90 EXTCODESIZE support for native contracts
    • RSKIP 91 New opcode STATICCALL
    • RSKIP 92 Merkle proof serialization
    • RSKIP 93 Deprecated native contract
    • RSKIP 94 Disable code replace
    • RSKIP 97 Remove difficulty drop
    • RSKIP 98 Bring forward fallback mining deactivation
